items.title: Index pattern
items.subTitle: Default index pattern to use on the app.
items.label: pattern

items.title: Request timeout
items.subTitle: Defines the maximum time the app will wait for an API response when making requests to it.
items.label: timeout

items.title: IP selector
items.subTitle: Defines if the user is allowed to change the selected index pattern directly from the top menu bar.
items.label: ip.selector

items.title: IP ignore
items.subTitle: Disable certain index pattern names from being available in index pattern selector from the Wazuh app.
items.label: ip.ignore

items.title: Cron prefix
items.subTitle: Define the index prefix of predefined jobs.
items.label: cron.prefix

items.title: Sample alerts prefix
items.subTitle: Define the index name prefix of sample alerts. It must match with the template used by the index pattern to avoid unknown fields in dashboards.
items.label: alerts.sample.prefix

items.title: Hide manager alerts
items.subTitle: Hide the alerts of the manager in all dashboards.
items.label: hideManagerAlerts

items.title: Log level
items.subTitle: Set the app logging level, allowed values are info and debug. Default is info.
items.label: logs.level

items.title: Enrollment DNS
items.subTitle: Set the Wazuh server address in the agent deployment.
items.label: enrollment.dns

items.title: Index pattern
items.subTitle: Enable or disable the index pattern health check when opening the app.
items.label: checks.pattern

items.title: Index template
items.subTitle: Enable or disable the template health check when opening the app.
items.label: checks.template

items.title: API connection
items.subTitle: Enable or disable the API health check when opening the app.
items.label: checks.api

items.title: API version
items.subTitle: Enable or disable the setup health check when opening the app.
items.label: checks.setup

items.title: Known fields
items.subTitle: Enable or disable the known fields health check when opening the app.
items.label: checks.fields

items.title: Remove meta fields
items.subTitle: Change the default value of the Kibana metaField configuration
items.label: checks.metaFields

items.title: Set max buckets to 200000
items.subTitle: Change the default value of the Kibana max buckets configuration
items.label: checks.maxBuckets

items.title: Set time filter to 24h
items.subTitle: hange the default value of the Kibana timeFilter configuration
items.label: checks.timeFilter

items.title: Status
items.subTitle: Enable or disable the wazuh-monitoring index creation and/or visualization.
items.label: wazuh.monitoring.enabled

items.title: Frequency
items.subTitle: Define in seconds the frequency the app generates a new document on the wazuh-monitoring index.
items.label: wazuh.monitoring.frequency

items.title: Index shards
items.subTitle: Define the number of shards to use for the wazuh-monitoring-* indices.
items.label: wazuh.monitoring.shards

items.title: Index replicas
items.subTitle: Define the number of replicas to use for the wazuh-monitoring-* indices.
items.label: wazuh.monitoring.replicas

items.title: Index creation
items.subTitle: Define the interval in which the wazuh-monitoring index will be created.
items.label: wazuh.monitoring.creation

items.title: Index pattern
items.subTitle: Default index pattern to use on the app for Wazuh monitoring.
items.label: wazuh.monitoring.pattern

items.title: Status
items.subTitle: Enable or disable the statistics tasks.
items.label: cron.statistics.status

items.title: Includes apis
items.subTitle: Enter the ID of the APIs you want to save data from, leave this empty to run the task on all configured APIs.
items.label: cron.statistics.apis

items.title: Interval
items.subTitle: Define the frequency of task execution using cron schedule expressions.
items.label: cron.statistics.interval

items.title: Index name
items.subTitle: Define the name of the index in which the documents are to be saved.
items.label: cron.statistics.index.name

items.title: Index creation
items.subTitle: Define the interval in which the index will be created.
items.label: cron.statistics.index.creation

items.title: Index shards
items.subTitle: Define the number of shards to use for the statistics indices.
items.label: cron.statistics.index.shards

items.title: Index replicas
items.subTitle: Define the number of replicas to use for the statistics indices.
items.label: cron.statistics.index.replicas

items.title: Logo App
items.subTitle: Define the name of the app logo saved in the path /plugins/wazuh/assets/
items.label: customization.logo.app

items.title: Logo Sidebar
items.subTitle: Define the name of the sidebar logo saved in the path /plugins/wazuh/assets/
items.label: customization.logo.sidebar

items.title: Logo Health Check
items.subTitle: Define the name of the health-check logo saved in the path /plugins/wazuh/assets/
items.label: customization.logo.healthcheck

items.title: Logo Reports
items.subTitle: Define the name of the reports logo (.png) saved in the path /plugins/wazuh/assets/
items.label: customization.logo.reports
